name: Arkadia Pre-Alpha
description: Arkadia is a 2D Pixel RPG game with a medieval theme. The main concept of this game is freedom. there is no story that must be followed, players can be whatever they want. Until now, players can do various things in Arkadia such as Using Melee Weapons and Spells, Crafting & Cooking, Farming, Taking Quests, Explore Dungeons and many more.
